title.narrative: INTERNAL PROGRAM DEVELPMENT

description.narrative: Improved internal UNICEF capacity to manage and coordinate program delivery for realization of the outcome and outputs for Basic Education and Gender Equality., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Skills Development, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, South Sudan is on course to achieve universal participation and increased and equitable completion of quality primary education with parity among boys and girls.
